snippet: Second seed Andy Murray showed no mercy to fellow Britain Liam Broady as he launched his Wimbledon challenge with a straightforward 6-2 6-3 6-4 victory on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Second seed Andy Murray showed no mercy to fellow Britain Liam Broady as he launched his Wimbledon challenge with a straightforward 6-2 6-3 6-4 victory on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: No Sentiment as Murray Beats Fellow Brit Broady
headline.main: No Sentiment as Murray Beats Fellow Brit Broady
